item.title: Project: One month of focus [UPDATE]
item.description: Update: Since I wrote this blog post, created the second MeetUp for “Rust and Tell”, something unexpected happened: My daugther was born. Way too early (3 months), so instead of spending September in front of Rust code, I spend around 10 hours a day in the hospital. This being said: The project for October is: Don’t have any plans ;) The dilemma of our privilidged and comfortable lifes as software engineers is:
